text: Cradle 2 the Grave is a 2003 action crime movie that was produced by Joel Silver and directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak. The movie was released on February 28, 2003 in the United States and on March 20, 2004 in Hong Kong. == Cast == *Jet Li as Su *DMX as Anthony Fait *Gabrielle Union as Daria *Mark Dacascos as Yao Ling *Kelly Hu as Sona *Drag-on as Miles *Anthony Anderson as Tommy *Tom Arnold as Archie *Paige Hurd as Vanessa Fait *Paolo Seganti as Christophe *Michael Jace as Odion *Chi McBride as Jump Chambers *Lester Speight as Chamber's Club Doorman *Randy Couture as Fight Club Fighter #8 and Fighter 1 *Martin Klebba as Fight Club Announcer *Johnny Nguyen as Ling's Henchman *Tito Ortiz as Cage Fighter *Hector Echavarria as Cage Fighter *Natasha Yi as Club Girl (uncredited) *Chuck Liddell as Cage Fighter (uncredited) == Websites == * Category:2003 action movies Category:2000s American action movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak Category:2000s English-language movies Category:African-American movies Category:American heist movies Category:American crime movies Category:Martial arts movies Category:2003 crime movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Cradle 2 the Grave
